readingMnemonic:
This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You haven't learned these readings for 絹 and 糸 yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

Who only uses clothes made with <vocabulary>silk thread</vocabulary>? <reading>Ken</reading>'s <reading>shee</reading>p (し)! Ken's sheep is very particular, and only wears clothes made from silk thread while it's waiting for its wool to grow back.
